description: Number of divisors of n of form 5k+3.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: Join[{0}, Table[d = Divisors[n]; Length[Select[d, Mod[#, 5] == 3 &]], {n, 100}]] (* _T. D. Noe_, Aug 10 2012 *)Table[Count[Divisors[n],_?(Mod[#,5]==3&)],{n,0,90}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 08 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
